title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Marc Ambinder is the American journalist and investigative reporter who was the editor at large of The Week, and a... <!--more--> contributing editor for The Atlantic.  Earlier he was the White House correspondent at the National Journal and has worked with both ABC and CBS news.
   In addition to domestic politics, Marc focuses on issues related to intelligence and national security.
His book The Command examined the secretive Joint Special Operations Command, and his recent book, co-authored with DB Grady, is  “Deep State: inside the Government Secrecy Industry” unveils the scope of the intelligence agencies’ expanding climate of secrecy.
He also hosts a popular blog  DeepState.org
